issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] Document the SQL -> Arrow type mapping
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9914](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9914). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
DataFusion uses SQL data types for its query language, but Arrow types for its plans and execution. We should document the mapping of SQL types to Arrow types.
